name: MyVirtualAssistantPepper
0:
”Alexa, ask my Pepper”
”Alexa, ask my Pepper for daily briefing”
”Alexa, ask my Pepper What's the travel time.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my pepper
des: Your virtual assistant, who can provide you information from a single access point. Currently, it will read you a daily briefing of news from WSJ, NY Times, give you travel time to a location as well as how to say simple words or phrases (try "hello" or "I love you") in Chinese. The features will evolve and will have a portal to allow personalization in the future. Current Chinese words are limited, but will be populated in the next update. Your feedback is welcome to help us prioritize what to develop first.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
